title: The Unique Automatic Pan Stirrer - Longer Nylon Legs, Olive Green
features: Ideal for stirring sauces, soups, porridge, gravy and other mixtures
Cordless and battery operated. 4 pieces AA batteries are required
Legs can be removed and placed in the dishwasher.
description: This stirrer has moulded plastic legs for a smooth and glossy look. It has a one handed push button to turn it on/off with 3 speed options. Just place it in a pan or pot, turn it on, and it automatically rotates. Perfect for stirring sauces, soups, porridge, gravy and other mixtures. The stirrer is cordless and battery operated (4 pieces AA batteries are required). The legs can be removed, and are dishwasher safe.Stirring sauces and other mixtures properly. Now you will have a free hand to do other kitchen tasks!Size:14.5*12*4cm
